tabs.title: Tab

tabs.content:
// Use 'take' to view a sample number of records in the table and check the data.
bikes
| take 100

bikes
| summarize TotalBikes = sum(No_Bikes) by Neighbourhood, Street

bikes
| filter No_Empty_Docks > 10

bikes
| order by No_Bikes desc

bikes
| summarize contagem = count_distinct(Street)

bikes
| summarize count()

bikes
|where No_Bikes == 1
|take 2
|extend Duplo = No_Bikes * 2 
|project Street, No_Bikes, Duplo

bikes
| where No_Bikes > 5
| summarize TotalPoints = count() by Neighbourhood

bikes
| summarize AvgDocks = round(avg(No_Empty_Docks),2) by Neighbourhood

bikes
| summarize Points_No = max(No_Bikes) by BikepointID
| sort by Points_No desc 
| limit 3

bikes
| where Neighbourhood == "St. John's Wood" and Latitude > 51.53

bikes
| extend TotalSlots = No_Bikes + No_Empty_Docks

bikes
| where Latitude between (51.25 .. 51.530)

bikes
| where Latitude >= 51.525 and Latitude <= 51.530

bikes
| extend Proporcao = round(No_Bikes/(No_Bikes + No_Empty_Docks),2)

bikes
| summarize TotalDocks = sum(No_Empty_Docks) by Neighbourhood
| order by TotalDocks desc
| take 1

bikes
| where Neighbourhood in ("Old Ford", "London Bridge")

bikes
| summarize AvgBikes = round(avg(No_Bikes),2) by Street
